SOOFUN Cool Tool Gadgets

2022 Original & Creative Design: SOOFUN multi tool pens are newly designed with a strong magnet, which can be used as a magnetic pick up tool. The magnetic magnet head is telescopic and can be extended up to 22”. Give you this extra “life-saving” reach when your keys fall into the gap on your car or through a grid into a sewer. Fixing your car will become so much easier, knowing that you can reach your parts, bolts, screws, or nuts that have fallen down, without having to crawl under your car
Unique Tool Gifts for Men & Women: SOOFUN cool pen tool is a Novelty gifts ideas for Christmas, Fathers Day, Thanksgiving Day, Valentines Day, and other holidays for father dad boyfriend grandpa brother men or women. The pocket tools can be used in home improvement, house maintenance, construction, electrical, office, mechanic auto repair & DIY for handyman engineer electrician carpenter woodworker. Useful stocking stuffers for men women dad boyfriend grandpa husband adults who have everything
6 in 1 Multitool Pen: SOOFUN multifunctional pen set is a gadgety novelty pen with 6 neat features, magnetic pickup tool, super bright LED Light, ballpoint pen, standard & metric ruler, bubble level, and pocket clip. SOOFUN ballpoint pens are designed to write smoothly with a continuous ink flow for a remarkable writing experience. Cool gadgets tool pen is an innovative tool, which truly a work of art with engineering, that combines the daily multi tools into a pen to provide endless functions
Durable EDC Pocket Tool Pen: SOOFUN Tool gadget lovers will enjoy a mini tool pen anywhere anytime! Journal in the morning, home repair in the afternoon. One tool to do it all! This cool pen is going to look nice in your pocket & desk, and get the job done whether you are signing a contract or taking notes. Constructed of heavy-duty metal & come with 3 extra ink refills, and last for endless projects. With the compact size & pen clip, you can secure it to your pocket when you carry it around
Trustworthy SOOFUN Construction Tool Pens: Your satisfaction is our top priority. If you’re not thrilled with SOOFUN multitool pen, simply contact us and we’ll replace your item or process a refund. We offer a lifetime service & no reason return policy for your better purchase experience. We’re standing by to assist you all the time! The cool tool gifts for men come with a 6-IN-1 TOOL PEN, exquisite gift box, and are full of sincerity, which is perfect for Christmas gifts/ Stockings Stuffers.
  • Gifts for Who: Novelty pens gifts for construction, engineer, woodworker, carpenter, handyman, artists, mechanic, electrical, contractor, architects, DIY enthusiasts, etc.
  • Unique & stylish cool stuff gadgets for men & women who have everything/ who wants nothing!

Magnetic Pickup Tool – A Knuckle Saver & Time Saver

When most people think of using a magnetic pickup tool they think of the most basic uses: picking up nails and screws, but they are not the only way to put this tool to use.

  • For your daily use – pickup things that scattered under your floors
  • For who with back problems – pickup things conveniently without bending over
  • Multitool Pen with magnetic pickup tools are a great tool to keep handy for everyday use.

LED Light – Super Bright & Practical

  • How to Use: Step1. Unscrew the cap on the top of the pen; Step2. Press gently; Step3. You will get a bright led light.
  • Not only it is a funny & classic pen and gadget for men, but also a tool for mechanics flashlight with a magnet. You won’t know you needed one until you have one!
